DOC.brief_summary: Prospective , monocenter post market clinical follow-up primary knee replacement bear CE-mark . 200 subject recruit follow ten year revision primary knee endoprosthesis , whichever occur first . Documentation clinical radiological parameter within clinical routine pre-operative post-operative 3 12 month 2 , 5 10 year evaluate time revision , pain situation , knee functionality , mobility stability .
DOC.brief_title: Prospective Post Market Clinical Follow-Up Primary Knee Endoprosthesis BPK-S Integration
DOC.criteria: Congenital acquire knee joint defects/deformation Defects malfunction knee joint Arthrosis ( degenerative , rheumatic ) Posttraumatic arthritis Symptomatic knee instability Reconstruction flexibility Patients metal hypersensitivity ( ceramic tibia/femur ) Illnesses treat without use knee joint implant . Acute chronic infection near implantation Systemic diseases metabolic disorder Serious osteoporosis Serious damage bone structure impedes stable implantation implant component Diseases impair bone growth , e.g . cancer , renal dialysis , osteopenia , etc . Bone tumor area implant anchor Obesity overweight patient Overload knee implant expect Abuse medication , drug abuse , alcoholism mental disease Lack patient cooperation Sensitivity foreign matter implant material Patients age 18 Patients participate another trial
